english.segment1: Creator, sustainer. Our hearts were made for You. Our Abba, our Father. The home we're running to
english.segment2: Drawn by Your kindness. Held by Your grace. Your generous mercy inspires songs of praise
english.segment3: Wonderful, wonderful. You're the one thing that we need. How we long for Your house. For the healing that it brings
english.segment4: Protector, provider. The God who calls us friend. Our shepherd, our shelter. We turn to You again
english.segment5: Drawn by Your kindness. Held by Your grace. Your generous mercy inspires songs of praise
english.segment6: Wonderful, wonderful. You're the one thing that we need. How we long for Your house. For the healing that it brings. Beautiful, beautiful. More than any other thing. We were born for Your courts. For the presence of the king
english.segment7: You're all we need Lord. Jesus, our hearts were made for You. You're all we need Lord. Jesus, no other God will do. You're all we need Lord. Jesus, our hearts were made for You. You're all we need Lord. Jesus, Jesus
english.segment8: Drawn by Your kindness. Held by Your grace. Your generous mercy. Inspires songs of praise
